description: The `main.dart` file serves as the entry point for a Flutter mobile application called 'Black & Gold Dining'. It sets up the application's root widget, initializes state providers (`MenuProvider`, `CartProvider`, `OrdersProvider`), and applies theming with `AppTheme`. It also launches the app with a splash screen.

classes.name: RestaurantApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter app that builds the widget tree, initializes providers, and sets up the app theme.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the `RestaurantApp` widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the `RestaurantApp`, setting up state providers and theming.
